calcInvestedAssets(address[],uint256[],u.details: This is writable function because we need to update current balances in the internal protocols.

returns.amountOut: Invested asset amount under control (in terms of {asset})

params.amountToRepay: Amount to repay in terms of {borrowAsset}

returns.returnedAssetAmountOut: Amount of collateral received back after repaying

closePositionsToGetAmount(ITetuConverter.details: We assume here that this function is called before closing any positions in the current block

params.requestedAmount: Requested amount of main asset that should be added to the current balance

returns.expectedAmount: Main asset amount expected to be received on balance after all conversions and swaps

params.amountsToConvert: Amounts to convert, the order of asset is same as in {tokens}
params.indexAsset: Index of the main asset in {tokens}
params.liquidationThreshold: Min allowed amount of main asset to be liquidated in {liquidator}

returns.collateralOut: Total amount of main asset returned after closing positions
returns.repaidAmountsOut: What amounts were spent in exchange of the {collateralOut}

params.collaterals_: Amounts of main asset that can be used as collateral to borrow {tokens_}
params.thresholdMainAsset_: Value of liquidation threshold for the main (collateral) asset

params.receivedAmountOut: Amount of {tokenOut_} has been returned by the liquidator
params.skipValidation: Don't check correctness of conversion using TetuConverter's oracle (i.e. for reward tokens)
params.spentAmountIn: Amount of {tokenIn} has been consumed by the liquidator

params.entryData_: Encoded entry kind and additional params if necessary (set of params depends on the kind)                   See TetuConverter\EntryKinds.sol\ENTRY_KIND_XXX constants for possible entry kinds                   0 or empty: Amount of collateral {amountIn_} is fixed, amount of borrow should be max possible.

params.amountsToConvert: Amounts of {tokens} to be converted, they are located on the balance before withdraw
params.withdrawnAmounts: Amounts of {tokens} that were withdrew from the pool

params.rewardAmounts: Amounts of {rewardTokens_}; we assume, there are no zero amounts here
params.rewardTokens: Full list of reward tokens received from tetuConverter and depositor

returns.amountToPerformanceAndInsurance: Amount of underlying to be sent to performance receiver and insurance
returns.amountsToForward: Amounts of {rewardTokens} to be sent to forwarder, zero amounts are allowed here

params.amount_: Amount of the main asset requested by converter
params.asset: Main asset or underlying (it can be different from tokens[indexTheAsset])
params.indexTheAsset: Index of the asset required by converter in the {tokens}

returns.amountOut: Amount of the main asset sent to converter

GAP_CONVERSION.details: We assume that: conversion-result-calculated-by-prices - liquidation-result <= the-gap

calcInvestedAssets(address[],uint256[],u.notice: Calculate amount we will receive when we withdraw all from pool

closePosition(ITetuConverter,address,add.notice: Close the given position, pay {amountToRepay}, return collateral amount in result

closePositionsToGetAmount(ITetuConverter.notice: Close debts (if it's allowed) in converter until we don't have {requestedAmount} on balance

convertAfterWithdraw(ITetuConverter,ITet.notice: Convert {amountsToConvert_} (available on balance) to the main asset         Swap leftovers if any.         Result amount can be less than requested one, we don't try to close any other debts here

getTokenAmounts(ITetuConverter,address[].notice: Make borrow and save amounts of tokens available for deposit to tokenAmounts

liquidate(ITetuConverter,ITetuLiquidator.notice: Make liquidation if estimated amountOut exceeds the given threshold

openPosition(ITetuConverter,bytes,addres.notice: Make one or several borrow necessary to supply/borrow required {amountIn_} according to {entryData_}         Max possible collateral should be approved before calling of this function.

postWithdrawActionsEmpty(ITetuConverter,.notice: return {withdrawnAmounts} with zero values and expected amount calculated using {amountsToConvert_}

recycle(ITetuConverter,address,uint256,a.notice: Recycle the amounts: split each amount on tree parts: performance+insurance (P), forwarder (F), compound (C)         Liquidate P+C, send F to the forwarder. We have two kinds of rewards: 1) rewards in depositor's assets (the assets returned by _depositorPoolAssets) 2) any other rewards All received rewards divided on three parts: to performance receiver+insurance, to forwarder, to compound   Compound-part of Rewards-2 can be liquidated   Compound part of Rewards-1 should be just left on the balance   All forwarder-parts are returned in amountsToForward and should be transferred to the forwarder outside.   Performance amounts are liquidated, result amount of underlying is returned in {amountToPerformanceAndInsurance}
